unnormalised: Arre, anik ek circular ailem amkam Block Development Officer haka "Shri" B.D.O. Kumar mhunn ulo korunk sangon?  "BDO saab" purayen formal naslem mhunn koso? Aata panchayat office-antlem chai pyeunkhi UPSC interview dilea bhaxen distolem.
normalised: Arre, ani ek circular, Block Development Officer-ak "Shri" B-D-O. Kumar mhunn ulo korunk sangta? "B-D-O saab" puraan puro naashillo? Aata panchayat office-antle chai-i U-P-S-C interview bhaxen dishtti ditlo.
text: Arre, anik ek circular ailem amkam Block Development Officer haka "Shri" B.D.O. Kumar mhunn ulo korunk sangon?  "BDO saab" purayen formal naslem mhunn koso? Aata panchayat office-antlem chai pyeunkhi UPSC interview dilea bhaxen distolem.
